title: Uchkakar
description: Fortified settlement on the banks of the Cheptsa River, inhabited from the 9th-13th centuries CE and associated with the Cheptsa culture

properties.description: Point representing the visible remains of the hillfort at Uchkakar, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Zhurbin et al. 2018.
properties.title: OSM location of Uchkakar
